title: NLTK Python Tutorial | Natural Language Processing (NLP) With Python Using NLTK | Simplilearn
excerpt: Natural Language Processing is a technique that is widely used in the field of AI and Machine Learning. In this video, you learn about the NLTK library and its use for natural language processing and text mining tasks. You will look at Speech Recognition, Spam Filtering, and Sentiment Analysis.
